grins
Class SMILCanvas

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Canvas
              |
              +--grins.SMILCanvas
public class SMILCanvas
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

Represents a top level window in SMIL 2. A SMILCanvas implements the needed support for rendering and SMIL 2 mouse events.

See Also:
